remarks: The restriction of a binary operation with identity to a subset containing the identity has the same identity element.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 8-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)
statement:
exidres.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
exidres.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
exidres.3 $e |- H = ( G |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
exidresid $p |- ( ( ( G e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) /\ Y C_ X /\ U e. Y ) /\ H e. Magma ) -> ( GId ` H ) = U ) $.
